rules.natural: If the Environmental Conservation Consortium receives government grant funding, then the Environmental Conservation Consortium conducts research on the wetland ecosystem

rules.prover9_expression: monitors_progress(ProjectBoard, Consortium) -> (-(conducts_research(Consortium, WetlandEcosystem) -> achieves_conservation(WetlandEcosystem)) -> halts_project(Consortium, WetlandRestoration))
rules.natural: If the Project Board monitors the progress of the Environmental Conservation Consortium, then should the Environmental Conservation Consortium conducting research on the wetland ecosystem not lead to the wetland ecosystem achieving conservation status, the Environmental Conservation Consortium halts the wetland restoration project
If the Environmental Conservation Consortium publishes findings in a scientific journal, then the wetland ecosystem achieves conservation status

If the University provides expertise to the Environmental Conservation Consortium, then when the Environmental Conservation Consortium conducts research on the wetland ecosystem, the Environmental Conservation Consortium publishes findings in a scientific journal
Either the Local Community withdraws support from the Environmental Conservation Consortium or the University provides expertise to the Environmental Conservation Consortium

facts.natural: The Environmental Conservation Consortium receives government grant funding
The Project Board monitors the progress of the Environmental Conservation Consortium
The Environmental Conservation Consortium does not halt the wetland restoration project
The Local Community does not withdraw support from the Environmental Conservation Consortium

target.natural: The wetland ecosystem achieves conservation status

If the Environmental Conservation Consortium conducts research on the wetland ecosystem, then the wetland ecosystem achieves conservation status

The wetland ecosystem achieves conservation status
